No. 2

Uyuni Salt Flats in Bolivia

Uyuni, Bolivia

The Uyuni Salt Flats and surrounding landscape in the south-west of Bolivia, is honestly mind bending. Our research before treking out here talked mostly about the incredible Salt Flat, but it was the landscape beyond that was truly out of this world. Ive put together a collection of the most dramatic photos in this album but if you want to see and read more about my experience, head over to my blog post about it.
